hotels.title: Beachfront Fiji Family-Friendly Paradise with Onsite Dining, Pool, Spa & Private Island Access
hotels.description: A slice of seaside serenity, this lush tropical paradise is expertly designed to delight the whole family. While children explore with their dedicated Nanuku buddy, parents can savour private treetop dining experiences, indulge in an island spa treatment or enjoy an intimate bonfire on the beach. Snorkelling over vibrant coral reefs, days of relaxation by the beach and delicious and authentic cuisine are just some of the many attractions of this idyllic isle. Set in Fiji’s adventure capital, Nanuku embraces everything from shark diving and rainforest treks to immersive Fijian cultural experiences and holistic wellness. Make unforgettable memories spotting clownfish in colourful coral reefs or searching for crabs in the mangroves, before enjoying dining with fresh local flavours. Intimate villas with private plunge pools, personalised service and access to Nanuku Island, your very own private island to elevate your relaxation further.

hotels.title: Five-Star Beachfront Fiji Resort with 18-Hole Championship Golf Course
hotels.description: Nestled among white sands, swaying palm trees and 35 acres of tropical gardens, you'll find the five-star InterContinental Fiji Golf Resort & Spa. Sitting on the shores of Natadola Beach with unbeatable views of the Pacific Ocean and dazzling turqouise lagoon, the resort features stunning interior design and architecture, heavily inspired by a traditional Fijian village. An 18-hole championship golf course is the jewel in the resort's crown, where golf enthusiasts of all skill levels can practice their swing alongside dramatic, beachfront landscapes. After completing the course, take a breather with a decadent seafood meal at one of the onsite restaurants or massage your worries and aches away at the luxurious Spa InterContinental. End the night with a locally-inspired cocktail at Kama Lounge while enjoying a selection of authentic Fiji entertainment, including live music and South Pacific fire dancing.

hotels.title: Outrigger Fiji Five-Star Family-Friendly Coral Coast Luxury
hotels.description: Set your watch to island time and surrender to the laidback rhythm of Fiji at the five-star Outrigger Fiji Beach Resort - a beachfront haven nestled in the heart of the adventure-filled Coral Coast. This tropical sanctuary blends traditional charm with modern luxury, offering everything from sleek contemporary rooms to thatched beachfront bures inspired by classic Fijian design. Perfect for both families and couples, the resort features a dedicated adults-only zone for peaceful moments, while younger guests are entertained with a vibrant kids’ club, teen activities and babysitting services. Immerse yourself in Fiji’s rich culture with daily experiences, from kava ceremonies to mesmerising firewalking performances (on select days). Explore vibrant coral reefs and crystal-clear lagoons with snorkelling and kayaking adventures, or join the OUTRIGGER Zone coral planting program and play a part in preserving Fiji’s marine life. As the day ends, relax on sugar-soft sands and watch the sky come alive with the fiery hues of a Coral Coast sunset.
